comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I haven't been that zonked in a while; dizzy as hell, vision all black around the edges, ears ringing, overwhelming nausea and panic fighting for the upper hand... all the classic symptoms of dinner at my mother-in-law's house. I barely got back to the office w/out hitting the deck, then I found my 1:15 has cancelled. Little tweaker had crashed his skateboard or somesuch. Whatever. Perfect weather today, though. Startin' to feel a bit like spring!
